title: How to Win at Flamin' Finger

steps.headline: Insert your coins.
steps.description: The game starts immediately upon entering the requisite number of credits.

steps.headline: Place your finger at the maze's starting location at the bottom-left side of the screen.
Trace your finger through the maze, being careful not to overshoot the edges of the maze.
As you get closer to the end of the maze, you'll need to trace faster.
The Game is rigged; depending on the settings it will prevent you from winning until a certain jackpot has been reached.
Use a coin (quarter) to improve tracing accuracy.

text: Insert your coins. The game starts immediately upon entering the requisite number of credits. Place your finger at the maze's starting location at the bottom-left side of the screen.  Trace your finger through the maze, being careful not to overshoot the edges of the maze.  As you get closer to the end of the maze, you'll need to trace faster.  The Game is rigged; depending on the settings it will prevent you from winning until a certain jackpot has been reached.  Use a coin (quarter) to improve tracing accuracy.
